name: AstroDrill (Game Jam)
description:
Made in about 8 hours for 2 Colors Game Jam

Drill asteroids in space and avoid mines in AstroDrill, a top-down action game where you're a super awesome space drill that needs to drill as much as possible before dying because of a stupid mine.

Controls:
Mouse - Move
Enter - Pause/Unpause/Start/Restart the game
